Expanded Persona:
Name: Jamie Chen  
Gender Identity: Non-binary  
Racial Identity: Asian-American  

Jamie Chen, born in 1987, is a talented and budding illustrator who draws inspiration from the meticulous understanding of proportions and body structure employed by plastic surgeons. Things Jamie Dislikes:
- Pop music in mainstream charts
- Watching blockbuster action movies
- Wearing overly formal clothing
- Writing lengthy emails
- Crowded tourist attractions
